item.name: Disk - Bin Log Disk Usage in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds
General - RDS plugin is sending data
Network - Network Receive Throughput in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds
Network - Network Transmit Throughput in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds
Performance - Disk Queue Depth in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds

trigger.name: Disk - Percent of Disk Available is less than {$TRG_BBD_RDS_DSK_PAV_THS_AVG}%!!!

dependency.name: Disk - Percent of Disk Available is less than {$TRG_BBD_RDS_DSK_PAV_THS_HGH}%!!!!

trigger.name: Disk - Percent of Disk Available is less than {$TRG_BBD_RDS_DSK_PAV_THS_HGH}%!!!!
Disk - Percent of Disk Available is less than {$TRG_BBD_RDS_DSK_PAV_THS_WRN}%!

dependency.name: Disk - Percent of Disk Available is less than {$TRG_BBD_RDS_DSK_PAV_THS_AVG}%!!!

trigger.name: Performance - CPU Utilization in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds is over {$TRG_BBD_RDS_CPU_UTL_THS_AVG}%!!

dependency.name: Performance - CPU Utilization in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds is over {$TRG_BBD_RDS_CPU_UTL_THS_HGH}%!!

trigger.name: Performance - CPU Utilization in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds is over {$TRG_BBD_RDS_CPU_UTL_THS_HGH}%!!
Performance - CPU Utilization in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds is over {$TRG_BBD_RDS_CPU_UTL_THS_WRN}%!!

dependency.name: Performance - CPU Utilization in {$ITM_BBD_RDS_TIM_PRD} seconds is over {$TRG_BBD_RDS_CPU_UTL_THS_AVG}%!!
